content:
Swimmers competed for medals in different events at the $2012$ Summer Olympics in London. The table below shows how many gold and silver medals were won by a sample of nations. 
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
| USA | China | France | Netherlands | Australia
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Gold** | $16$ | $5$ | $4$ | $2$ | $1$
**Silver** | $9$ | $2$ | $2$ | $1$ | $6$
 
[[â˜ƒ interactive-graph 1]]
